name: list_playlist_tracks_and_episodes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Lists tracks and episodes in a specified Spotify playlist.

playlistid.description: The ID of the playlist to list contents from.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect results. Defaults to `0`.

limit.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `100`.
